GSD.product_version: versions from v4.17 to before v5.15.82
GSD.description:
net: tun: Fix use-after-free in tun_detach()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.82 by commit 04b995e963229501401810dab89dc73e7f12d054, it was introduced in version v4.17 by commit 83c1f36f9880814b24cdf6c2f91f66f61db65326. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: tun: Fix use-after-free in tun_detach()
